Youd like to see more body parts eh? I can help you there

>> Youd like to see more body parts eh? I can help you there 
Please contribute to the topic.

I want the masks from tf2 when the spy disguises as the other team.

And an epic trollface mask. I'm sure some one made a model for it already.

How about custom character models? From Half-life 2, more counterstrike models, etc.  Sure it would make individuals easy to identify, which could be a downside, but if you're vain enough (I am) to want a unique character, deal with it.  The only real problem other that is that the advanced disguiser wouldn't show you wearing these if you disguised as a person with that, but it doesn't anyway so eh.  I would love more stuff, but it all comes down to the people with the time and know-how to add them.

I think if you are a good traitor , it doesnt matter what you have from the shop. i have a custom trial and get called out alot and still have successful traitor rounds.
i support player models
Well yeah, I support them too.  I think they would be cool, I was just voicing issues with them for.... I don't know why.  Carry on, nothing to see here.

Dum and Gash already tried out player models, and I don't think it really worked out, or Gash would need to spend alot of time trying to edit it to work on the server.

I would support new TTT shop items, but have absolutely nothing of my own.
